title: Pseudopods
data:
{| cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" border="1" |- style="font-style:italic;" |Rank||Effect||Flavor |- |1||[[Auxiliary]] pseudopod attack.
Reduces body armour base [[AC]] by 50%.||Armour fits poorly on your pseudopods. |- |2||Stronger pseudopod attack.||Armour fits poorly on your large pseudopods. |- |3||Even stronger pseudopod attack. ||Armour fits poorly on your massive pseudopods. |- | colspan="3" | '''Damage:''' (4 * rank)
'''Chance''': 66% * (30 + XL)/59 per melee attack
The Pseudopods AC penalty functions identically to the [[Deformed]] mutation.
If you have both, only one AC penalty is applied. |- style="font-style:italic;" | colspan="3" | [[Jiyva mutation]] |} [[Category:Mutations]] [[Category:Jiyva Mutations]]
